title: Marigolds in full bloom in Huber Heights
content:
Huber Heights Marigold Festival (WDTN Photo/Justin Kraus)  
HUBER HEIGHTS, Ohio (WDTN) — Marigolds were in full bloom in Huber Heights. 
 
The third annual Marigold Festival kicked off Saturday morning at the Eichelberger Amphitheater on State Route 201 near the YMCA. 
 
The festival features more than 100 vendors, craft booths, and live entertainment, including three finalists from “Huber’s Got Talent.” 
 
The Huber Heights Arts and Beautification Commission is hosting the event. 
 
The festival is free and runs until 7 p.m.
